00032 #ifndef         QUERY_PARSER_H_
00033 # define        QUERY_PARSER_H_

00035 #include "opj_includes.h"

00038 #define MAX_NUMOFBOX 10
00039 
00041 typedef enum cnew_transport { non, http, tcp, udp} cnew_transport_t;
00042 
00044 typedef enum image_return { JPPstream, JPTstream, UNKNOWN=-1} image_return_t;
00045 
00047 typedef struct query_param{
00048   char *target;                               
00049   char *tid;                                  
00050   int fx, fy;                                 
00051   int rx, ry, rw, rh;                         
00052   int layers;                                 
00053   int lastcomp;                               
00054   OPJ_BOOL *comps;                                
00055   char *cid;                                  
00056   cnew_transport_t cnew;                      
00057   char *cclose;                               
00058   int numOfcclose;                            
00059   char box_type[MAX_NUMOFBOX][4];             
00060   int limit[MAX_NUMOFBOX];                    
00061   OPJ_BOOL w[MAX_NUMOFBOX];                       
00062   OPJ_BOOL s[MAX_NUMOFBOX];
00063   OPJ_BOOL g[MAX_NUMOFBOX];
00064   OPJ_BOOL a[MAX_NUMOFBOX];
00065   OPJ_BOOL priority[MAX_NUMOFBOX];                
00066   int root_bin;                               
00067   int max_depth;                              
00068   OPJ_BOOL metadata_only;                         
00069   image_return_t return_type;                 
00070   int len;                                    
00071 } query_param_t;
